rev.comment: adding photo of murder trial defendants
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1:   +
[[Image:Haywood_moyer_pettibone.jpg|thumb|left
  +
| 1907 photo of defendants [[Charles Moyer]], [[Bill Haywood]], and George Pettibone]]
'''George Pettibone''' was an Idaho miner. He was convicted of contempt of court and criminal conspiracy in the [[Coeur d'Alene miners' dispute]]. Pettibone was later implicated in the 1905 assassination of [[Frank Steunenberg]], ex-governor of Idaho. He was represented by [[Clarence Darrow]], the most renowned lawyer of the day. Due to lack of evidence, he was acquitted.
'''George Pettibone''' was an Idaho miner. He was convicted of contempt of court and criminal conspiracy in the [[Coeur d'Alene miners' dispute]]. Pettibone was later implicated in the 1905 assassination of [[Frank Steunenberg]], ex-governor of Idaho. He was represented by [[Clarence Darrow]], the most renowned lawyer of the day. Due to lack of evidence, he was acquitted.
